author: cnbc.com
title: Camping World Holdings, Inc. Announces Date of Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2017 Earnings Conference Call
text:
LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Camping World Holdings Inc. (NYSE:CWH) (the "Company"), the nation's largest network of RV-centric retail locations, today announced that its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2017 will be released after market close on Tuesday, February 27, 2018. The Company will host a conference call at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss the financial results.
Investors and analysts interested in participating in the call are invited to dial 800-239-9838 (international callers please dial 1-323-794-2551) approximately 10 minutes prior to the start of the call. A live audio webcast of the conference call will be available online at http://investor.campingworld.com .
A taped replay of the conference call will be available within two hours of the conclusion of the call and can be accessed both online and by dialing 844-512-2921 (international callers please dial 412-317-6671). The pin number to access the telephone replay is 6863288. The replay will be available until March 6, 2018.
About Camping World Holdings, Inc.
Camping World Holdings, Inc., is the leading outdoor and camping retailer, offering an extensive assortment of recreational vehicles for sale, RV and camping gear, RV maintenance and repair and the industry’s broadest and deepest range of services, protection plans, products and resources. Since the Company’s founding in 1966, Camping World has grown to become one of the most well-known destination for everything RV, with over 140 retail locations in 36 states and comprehensive e-commerce platform. Coupled with an unsurpassed portfolio of industry-leading brands including Gander Outdoors, Good Sam, Overton’s, The House, Uncle Dan’s and Windward/W82, and Erehwon. Camping World Holdings has become the synonymous with outdoor experiences. Camping World’s stock is traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol "CWH".
For more information, visit www.CampingWorld.com .
